column1: Little Goat Diner////I do not understand the rave reviews this restaurant receives on an ongoing basis.  The lunch is also sub par in comparison to most places in the area.   The only bigger rip-off in the area for breakfast is Meli Cafe.   We now go to Johnnies down the street where we can get a well cooked egg for $6.  Skip this place on the weekends too because for the money you can have brunch at Avec
column3: The Publican and several other restaurants in the neighborhood that have far better food.
